results.title: Hamburg man with history of violence toward women convicted in rape case
results.description: A jury on Thursday convicted Scott A. Saracina of first-degree rape for an attack in August 2022, the Erie County District Attorney's Office said.

results.title: South Washington Street down to two lanes at 28th Avenue South beginning June 30
results.description: NDDOT will be working to extend turn lanes at the intersection.

results.title: Tribune-Star Editorial: Vigo school buildings' condition a community impediment
results.description: The students who walk into their Vigo County school buildings possess vast potential.
